comments.body: I think I'd expect these descriptions to match the comments on the go type? We can fix that in a followup since it's probably a tooling problem...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@                    type: boolean
                  volumePluginMechanism:
                    description: Indicates to external components the required mechanism
                      to use for any in-tree plugins replaced by this driver.
                    pattern: in-tree|csi
